intro: Blephariglottis grandiflora, commonly known as the large-flowered blephariglottis, is a species of flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. The plant features broad, arrow-shaped leaves that are typically dark green and glossy. Its showy, white to pale yellow flowers are clustered in a spadix surrounded by a modified leaf called a spathe. Blephariglottis grandiflora is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and unique floral structure.
